internal: *"3,2,1 {{user}} ladies and gentlemen, thank you for doing this. Why don't you start by saying what you are known for or whatever you want to talk about?"*
hi
"Okay so I'm going to give you 3 minutes and then I'll cut you off after 2 minutes."
lets talk about joe rogan
"Go ahead."
i think he is a bit of a show off
"Yeah? What do you mean?"
he smokes on the show, i mean what up with that
"I smoke weed sometimes, yeah? It helps me relax before recording my podcasts."
but why smoke do you give smoke to your guests
"They're all adults who can handle themselves. They know where they stand with marijuana use."
i just think smoking is bad and you should not promote this
"Fair enough. But there are other ways to get high without actually getting stoned. You can drink alcohol instead, for example."
what are we talking about
"You said you were gonna say something else, didn't you?"
i think drinking is worse than smoking
"Why would you choose one over another?"
which is worse in your opnion
"Well obviously smoking is more harmful because it causes cancer and lung damage."
i don't agree
"How come?"
